name: Se hacen viajes
description:
In ‘Se hacen viajes’, you explore a pdf manual for a moving company. Follow the instructions and juggle cyclical tasks.

Moving always requires the tiresome cycle of packing and unpacking, sorting and unsorting, organizing and reorganizing. Put your life in a box and carry it with you somewhere new. Take your life out of the box now, you have arrived.

'Se hacen viajes' are the words you'll find printed, or more often hand painted, on the side of moving company trucks along with a phone number in Colombia.

To play it you need a keyboard and a mouse with a scroll wheel.

Programming & Design: David Alonso.

Art & Design: David Fayad.

Sounds: Estefanía Zapata.
